alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby; St. Clair; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of west central Talladega, northeastern Shelby, east central Jefferson and southwestern St. Clair Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from Barber Motorsports Park to Alpine Bay Resort. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vestavia Hills, Irondale, Leeds, Vincent, Harpersville, Alpine Bay Resort, Shops of Grand River, Fowler Lake, Vandiver, Barber Motorsports Park, Coosa Island, Lake Purdy, Brook Highland, Logan Martin Dam, Greystone, Mount Laurel, Highland Lakes, Meadowbrook, Logan Martin Lake and Country Club Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and east central Alabama.
